com.alexkasko.tasks
Interface Task

public interface Task

Interface for asynchronous multistage tasks. It's implied, that task has two different fields to represent current state: "stage" and "status". Stage (e.g. 'loading_data', 'finished') is and task processing state, Status (e.g. 'error', 'processing') is a task application status

Author:
alexkasko Date: 5/17/12
See Also:
TaskEngine, TaskStageChain, TaskManager
